FuncDef: This command specifies the dynamic data service SAP that is created. A dynamic service SAP ID uniquely identifies a dynamic data service instance. For a local authenticated dynamic service data trigger, one of the dynamic service SAP IDs must be the data trigger SAP.Thenoform of this command removes thesap-idfrom the configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a string representing the dynamic service SAP ID (only SAPs on Ethernet ports and LAGs are valid), up to 64 characters.
